contributions.message: To make this Family Guy-style dragon detective function analysis engaging for Instagram within 35 seconds, we must employ rapid-fire visual gags and concise explanations, treating each mathematical concept as a distinct clue or suspect in a case. The viral potential hinges on the sheer absurdity of applying detective tropes to calculus, amplified by rapid-fire visual humor and relatable 'mood swings' representing mathematical behavior.
